name: Tilt (am.blacksheep)
description:
The announcement of the theme reminded me the hours spent playing pinball and all the times I lost patience sent it on tilt when I was a child.

The idea of Tilt comes from this memory.

In this 2d platform the inputs change every few seconds and your character goes on tilt whenever you miss some inputs!

Assets by : GDQuest

Music by: Chad Crouch
